This module implements notice garbage puyos.

Compile Options:

OptionDescriptionDefault
-d:pon2.garbagerate.tsu=<int>Garbage rate in Tsu rule.70
-d:pon2.garbagerate.water=<int>Garbage rate in Water rule.90
